td.p: Name of the .dar file to be created. Default value is ${pom.artifactId}.dar.
The fully-qualified name of the Program-derived class, which is used as the entry point of the workflow application. Defaults to Main (a class in the root package.)
Specifies the URL of a dalma webui installation, such as http://localhost:8080/dalma/. This URL is used by the dalma:deploy goal to deploy a dar file.
Name of the workflow application that the dalma:deploy goal deploys to. Defaults to ${pom.artifactId}
